data.title: Oakdale School District 622
data.meta_description: Home - North St. Paul-Maplewood-Oakdale School District 622
data.text:
The purpose of the District 622 Finance Advisory Committee is to provide community-based input and feedback on district financial issues.

If you are interested in serving on the finance committee, please complete an interest form.

Meetings will be held on the following dates, from 6-7pm at the District Education Center in North St. Paul. August 6, 2024 December 10, 2024 March 25, 2025 May 13, 2025
